channel.title: Can cases have more than 2 objectives?
channel.description: well im using a case and i want it to do 6 things. but all separate. like i made fletching and a interface appear and the interface has a case which is a button. i want the button, when i fletch a oak shortbow to just fletch and oak shortbow. When i fletch a magic bow i want it to fletch just a magic bow. so the same case able to do more than one objective. if you dont understand plz post ill give like an example with pics[br][size=1]Posted on: May 21, 2007, 05:23:19 PM[/size][hr]desperatly need help!!

item.title: Can cases have more than 2 objectives?
item.dc:creator: @blade9670 blade9670
item.description:
@blade9670 wrote:

theres a glitch with it, like if i have all the logs in my inventory ill make all of them :([br][size=1]Posted on: May 21, 2007, 05:54:39 PM[/size][hr]help!?!?!?!??!

item.title: Can cases have more than 2 objectives?
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Yes it is possible. Do you mean like…
case ####:
if((playerHasItemAmount(oak log,blah)) && (playerHasItemAmount(knife…?,blah)))
{
this would be example oak bow
}
if((playerHasItemAmount(willow log,blah)) && (playerHasItemAmount(knife…, blah)))
{
this would be example willow bow
}
break;
so this would do a willow bow and oak bow if you had the oak log and willow log along with knife in inven, though.

Read full topic
